paper.title: The role of polymorphism in schema evolution in an object-oriented database

author.org: Department of Computer Science, University of Western Ontario, London, Ont, Canada#TAB#

paper.venue: IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering
paper.abstract: A polymorphic object algebra for an object-oriented database model is introduced. Types of schema modification that follow naturally from this model are described. It is shown to what extent queries return identical or equivalent results when the objects in the database are modified to conform to a modified schema. u003e
